forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 66F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 8C. NNW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 46F. NNW winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 61F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 9C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 62F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
